title: 4J Studios: Minecraft索尼版荣获索尼白金奖和网络奖
author: minehenry
txt_content:
本帖最后由 bobby825 于 2016-3-12 09:26 编辑 


4J Studios：Minecraft索尼版获得了索尼白金奖和索尼网络奖！感谢索尼：)

replies.author: WarbleOrigin
replies.txt_content: Minecraft又获奖了！

replies.author: 孤独秋叶
replies.txt_content: 真好玩，获奖了。:p
